            text run at (571,0) width 21: "foo"

          text run at (592,0) width 137: " should be bold below."

        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x20
          LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 21x19
            LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 21x19
              text run at (0,0) width 21: "foo"

          LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 170x28
            LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 170x24
